CustomField.formula: IF (ISNULL(Contract_Received__c ), null, IF (ISNULL(Hold_See_Notes__c ), null, Hold_See_Notes__c - Contract_Received__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Hold: See Notes field is blank, the duration will be blank. If the Hold: See Notes field is complete, the duration is calculated by the Hold: See Notes minus the Contract Received date.
CustomField.label: Pending Hold: See Notes (Duration)
